title: Strategies to Overcome Active Learning Resistance: Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodology and language teaching experience
context.additional_context: Analyzing learner resistance to activity-based instructional methods in online environments and exploring response strategies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more root causes of negative perceptions toward active learning.
Five classroom management strategies to mitigate learner resistance can be applied to practical cases.
A three-stage framework for designing collaborative activities in online environments is developed and pilot-tested.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
